summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.8°C) and outside temperature (down 2.4°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 751 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1450 m), feels like temperature (up 5.7°C), outside temperature (up 4.0°C), and inside temperature (up 1.7°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 751.4m lower than yesterday, 576.2m lower than the past week, 1450.1m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 745m to a maximum of 3580m, averaging 1235.0m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1811.2m and 2690m respectively.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, neither too dry nor too humid. Drizzle or light rain possible, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and it’s dark. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
